scripts.dev: npx astro telemetry disable; npx astro dev
scripts.start: npx astro telemetry disable; npx astro dev
scripts.build: npx astro telemetry disable; npx astro build
scripts.preview: npx astro telemetry disable; npx astro preview
scripts.astro: npx astro telemetry disable; npx astro
scripts.update-deps: npx npm-check-updates -u && npm install && npm audit fix
